page.title: 14MUSLIMS IN STOCKPORT
page.content: {CULTURE:}As well as going to Tithe Barn School we also go to our own school several evenings every week. Our school is for Muslims from Bangladesh.We learn to read Arabic so we can read the Qu'ran. The Qu'ran is the holy book of Islam and it includes the prayers that we should say 5 times a day. We also learn our own language, Bengali,which we sometimes use at home. {FOOD:}As well as English food we eat our own special foods. We eat special Halal meat and nothing from pigs.We like curries,samosas,kebabs and Tandoori chicken.We use lots of different spices. {RAMADAN:}Every year Muslims are supposed to fast for 30 days during Ramadan. We cannot eat between sunrise and sunset. After 30 days we have a special festival called Id Mubarak.
